Package weather

Class StevensonReading

java.lang.Object
weather.StevensonReading
All Implemented Interfaces:
WeatherReading
public final class StevensonReading extends Object implements WeatherReading
Stevenson Reading class has several methods to get and calculate different readings such as Dew Point, Temperature, Heat Index, etc.

  • Constructor Details

    • StevensonReading

      public StevensonReading​(double temperature, double dewPoint, double windSpeed, double totalRain)
      Set parameters and check the constraints.
      Parameters:
      temperature - for air temperature (T) in Celsius.
      dewPoint - for Dew Point (D).
      windSpeed - for wind speed (v) in miles per hour.
      totalRain - for total rain (rain) in mm.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when temperature is less than Dew Point.
      IllegalArgumentException - when wind speed is negative.
      IllegalArgumentException - when total rain negative.
